resources.string: Enabling this lets Keyspace fill in your usernames, passwords, OTP fields, credit card and other data into websites and apps.\n\nKeyspace uses AccessibilityService to autofill rather than the official Autofill API due to a fragmented autofill integration of the official Autofill API across apps and websites.
Keyspace uses Android Keystore and device lock to safely store and retrieve your encryption keys.\n\nPlease set up a screen lock to continue.

string.name: permissions_learn_more
string.html: Your safety is our priority. To see how Keyspace Android works internally, check out the source code.

resources.string: Your Vault is kept secure using your device lock and is only decrypted when you unlock Keyspace. If your device has a fingerprint sensor or facial recognition, we recommend setting it up for your convenience.\n\nTap the button below to unlock.
Your Vault is kept secure using your biometrics and is only decrypted when you unlock Keyspace.\n\nTap the button below to unlock.
Your Keyspace passphrase is an advanced security feature that lets you strengthen your account\'s security.\n\nThis step is optional.

string.name: show_words_disclaimer
string.html: Write this recovery phrase in correct order on a piece of paper and keep it safe. Don\'t share this with anyone!

resources.string: Please update Keyspace to the latest version.
Incorrect username or password entered. Please try again.
Keyspace servers are undergoing maintenance. Come back later.
Couldn\'t connect to Keyspace servers. Please check your connection and try again.
Hold your phone upright and unlock your vault.\n\n(This is done once in a while to keep your data secure)
This stores your encryption keys in the Keyring.
Enter your credentials to unlock the Keyring and access data.
Enter your credentials to unlock the Keyring and save data.

Write down these words somewhere, preferably on a piece of paper
Verify that the words are in the exact order as given with proper spelling
Store your recovery phrase in a secure location and make sure only you can access it
